mutants.code:
def calculate_total_money(D, d, P, Q):
    quo = D // d
    rem = D % d
    ans = 0
    ans = quo * (2 * P + (quo - 1) * Q) // 2
    ans = ans * d
    a = (P + quo * Q) * rem
    ans -= a
    return int(ans)
